programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A military officer who was gang raped refuses to cooperate with the SVU for fear of damage to her reputation; Amaro asks his ex to help dig up information on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a teen uses a rifle to stop an assault on his mother, he learns the perpetrator of the assault is someone he knows.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation hits a nerve with Benson when a suspect claims his genetic makeup causes him to commit rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man is found castrated and left for dead, Rollins and Carisi uncover three female suspects who have possible motives; Langan gives devastating news to Benson.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at USA's new series, "The Rainmaker.".

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Rollins tries to help a friend press rape charges against her lover, she finds herself thrust into the middle of the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man uses a false identity to lure a vulnerable married woman to bed, Barba thinks the evidence amounts to rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Benson goes into hiding to find justice for an abused housewife (Clea Duvall), uncovering a 34-year-old unsolved murder case in the process.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young female Marine goes missing as she is about to give birth to her rapist's child; Olivia struggles with painful flashbacks of her sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A judge asks Benson and Stabler to ask a convicted serial killer about the location of his son's body.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a night of drinking, a man (Scott Foley) wakes up with a head injury and a dead woman in his bed; Detectives Benson and Stabler try to piece together the crime by returning to the bar where the night began.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater settles into his new role; Lindsay turns to Voight for help; Jin is confronted about his meetings with Stillwell.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As the Sheldon Jin investigation moves forward, Internal Affairs keeps a close eye on Voight; Voight's vehicle is T-boned while following an armored car carrying Ruzek; Burgess meets her new partner; Lindsay visits her mom.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Several murder victims are found with a dollar bill pinned to their chests; Voight makes a discovery about a friend; a series of home invasions.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a bartender takes a bullet intended for Halstead, the bounty on him becomes more real; following a tense interaction, Platt and Nadia reach an understanding.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team races against the clock when two teenage girls disappear; Voight seeks honest answers from the father of one of the girls.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight is attacked and abducted while trying to help Olive; Roman and Burgess search for a girl who has taken off with a police badge.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek and Atwater go under cover as prison inmates in order to find the man they believe killed a 10-year-old girl; Burgess and Roman give a tour of the district to some boys they believe are part of the Police Explorers program.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Detective Voight shows up, looking to cash in the favor Dawson owes him; Casey's social life takes on a familiar pattern; Molly prepares for the grand opening of Dawson, Herrmann and Otis's bar; Severide faces a threat to his career.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide is accused of sexual misconduct; Casey starts to find satisfaction in his personal life; Dawson and Mills face challenges as they try to take their relationship to the next level; the squad faces a harrowing building collapse.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Lt. Casey must work with Voight and the Intelligence Unit; Shay grows increasingly excited about the prospect of motherhood; everyone comes together to support the opening of Molly's.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The squad must help defuse a volatile situation at the jail; Shay continues to be hopeful about motherhood; Herrmann's wife goes into labor; Mills and Dawson face important decisions.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Lt. Severide is targeted by an arsonist; Battalion Chief Boden clashes with Gail McLeod; the anniversary of Andy's death; Shay has suspicions; Mari visits Mouch.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey struggles with his new responsibilities; Severide dreads the arsonist's next attack; Mouch starts campaigning; Dawson and Shay decide they need to get out more.

programme.desc: In the first part of the seventh and final adventure, Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on their perilous mission to destroy the secret to Voldemort's immortality and destruction: the Horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Making their final stand upon the ramparts of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione face their greatest foe and make a sacrifice on their journey.

programme.desc: Harry faces one final threat, and one that forces him to use more than just his alien strength.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson seek a connection between two men who are beaten and branded with a wire hanger in seemingly separate incidents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man sees his wife abducted while video chatting with her, but Benson finds that the victim tried to pick up the ransom herself.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a young boy reminds Cragen, Munch and Benson of an unsolved case from 13 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives go under cover to arrest a man who brutally attacks other men; a deceptively tough defense attorney (Nia Vardalos) complicates ADA Barba's case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Members of the NCIS team are in danger after their pictures, as well as Mosley and her son's names, are included on a cartel hit list; Mosley is questioned about the off-the-books mission in Mexico.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: While assisting the team with an undercover operation, an informant is arrested; Callen meets with ATF Agent Anna Kolcheck, who remains on suspension following her last joint case with NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team attempts to locate Mosley after she murders a cartel hit man and goes off the grid.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must determine a murder victim's actual identity when the presumed victim turns up alive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenage girl's death in a hit-and-run accident leads Benson and Stabler to a human trafficking ring; Cragen becomes frustrated by his crumbling precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Benson and Stabler investigate a young woman's rape and murder, the case puts them in the line of fire and exposes a larger mystery that includes more victims.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler notices that Benson is bonding with Calvin, the boy left in her care; Fin and Munch must investigate when the name of Calvin's mother (Maria Bello) comes up during a rape investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the death of a young boy leads to a gambling ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have to get creative when a rape victim's father refuses to help the detectives get the information they need to solve a case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Sonya Paxton (Christine Lahti) tries to help an old friend (Debra Messing) who starts receiving personal threats.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into the stabbing death of a family man leads Benson and Stabler to believe he had an illicit hobby; the detectives meet a woman and her jealous boyfriend while undercover at a swingers club.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a baby is found on a playground, Detectives Stabler and Benson look for the child's caregiver.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman finds a teenage boy sleeping naked in her bedroom, detectives Benson and Stabler investigate the teen and his mother to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as GWS Giants face North Melbourne at Corroboree Group Oval Manuka. The Giants will be looking to bounce back after a crushing defeat to the Dogs.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Melbourne take on Western Bulldogs at the MCG. Can the Dogs build on their emphatic win over the Giants?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as West Coast Eagles play Adelaide Crows at Optus Stadium. The Crows are looking to continue their fine form and secure a double chance.

programme.title: Formula E Unplugged
programme.desc: Sam Bird returns to Season 9 with a spring in his step. A podium finish in the second race of the season shows signs that the old competitor is back, but then disaster strikes.

programme.title: Formula E Unplugged
programme.desc: We look at how the customers will push for both the drivers and constructors Championships with their two very different drivers.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Atalanta host Antonio Conte's league leaders Napoli at Gewiss Stadium. Atalanta have won their last two league matches against Napoli by a three-goal margin.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Simone Inzaghi's Inter look to get back to winning ways against an out-of-form Empoli at San Siro. Inter have won 13 of their last 14 league matches against Empoli.
